#SSP1 Conflict Change

##Africa

```{r}
ssp1_africa <- vect(here(HWC_data, "/Geospatial Data/Diminin_Replication_Data/differenced_polygons/ssp1_rcp26_2050_diff_polygon.shp"))

basemap_africa <- ne_countries(
  continent = "Africa",
  scale = "medium", 
  returnclass = "sf") %>% 
  st_transform(crs = crs(ssp1_africa))  # make sure crs is same as raster

basemap_africa_vect <- basemap_africa %>% 
  vect()


pal <- c("#2B83BA", "#ABDDA4", "#FFFFBF", "#FDAE61", "#D7191C")

#plot conflict boundaries
plot(basemap_africa_vect, col = "grey98", axes = 0)
plot(ssp1_africa, add = TRUE, pal = pal, border = pal, legend = TRUE)



tm_shape(ssp1_africa) +
  tm_polygons(col = "Conflict Change") +
  tm_fill(palette = "Conflict Change")
```
